Package dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.options

Global configuration options This package contains classes that allow to manipulte global configuration options of the Public API.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Options
    Global options that configure the public API are manged by this class.

Package dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.options Description

Global configuration options

This package contains classes that allow to manipulte global configuration options of the Public API.

The main interface to the option API is the class Options which provides access to currently all global options. With this class logging and exception handling can be configured. The class also provides access to the OutputStream use for printing debugging information.

Sub systems of the Public API may provide own local configuration classes either instance local or system wide. E.g. the dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.DCtxt class provides its instance local options via the class Opt in the same package.
